price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߞߋߟߊ ߟߐ߬ ߌߟߋ ߢߍ߫ ߝߟߐߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߙߎߞߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߝߛߊߦߌ߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiyaʿi al-awalīna
